meanings.definition: Feeling or showing anger or annoyance at what is perceived as unfair treatment.
meanings.sent1: She was indign when she saw the unfair decision.
meanings.sent2: The indign student protested against the unjust grading.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked indign when it didn't get the treat it wanted.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds seemed to wear an indign expression before the storm.
meanings.sent5: His indign face made it clear he was not happy with the situation.
